name: Patrick Valera
summary: I am a computer science student and a self-taught web developer. I aim to deepen my understanding of various technologies and build exceptional products.

projects.title: Groovemade
projects.description: A fullstack online E-commerce store, complete with user creation, management, order placement and admin control. Also features a sleek and modern design.

projects.title: Candelebra
projects.description: A real-time mock stock trading platform. Utilizes Rechart for graphing stock prices. Allows user to view real time stock prices and place trade orders.

projects.title: Artifox
projects.description: A Fullstack Online Store. Based off of theartifox.com and built from scratch. Styling done with SASS and CSS modules

projects.title: ChatterCord
projects.description: A realtime messaging web app utilizing Socket IO. Keeps track and stores user messages into a database.

projects.title: Spacetagram
projects.description: An image gallery that fetches Nasa's image of the day, all the way from the 1980's. Features an image viewer which can be controlled by the user.

projects.title: Studi fi
projects.description: Video player for a curated lofi/study playlist. Makes use of youtube's iframe API

projects.title: Recipe Finder
projects.description: Connects to a third party API to search for food recipes based on the user's input

projects.title: Portfolio V1
projects.description: First portfolio page built with material ui components and deployed on heroku.

projects.title: Portfolio V2
